mapper.select: SELECT T1.VST_NMN_N , T1.IST_NMN_N , T1.VST_DUEDT , T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, 'ko') AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF_NM , T1.FILT_CHNG_LV_CD , T1.WK_DT , T1.MTR_CAN_DT , T2.PD_CD , T2.PD_NM FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T1.PART_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.DTA_DL_YN ='N' WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} ORDER BY VST_DUEDT , FILT_CHNG_LV_CD

WITH SVPD_INF AS ( /* 매니저 방문이 있는 서비스 상품정보*/ SELECT P1.SV_PD_CD FROM TB_PDBS_RGBS_WK_BASE_BAS P1 /*정기BS작업기준기본*/ WHERE 1=1 AND P1.VST_DV_CD IN ('10', '11') GROUP BY P1.SV_PD_CD ) , MNGT_CSTN_INF AS ( /* 관리고객수 */ SELECT S1.MNGT_YM /* 확정 담당파트너 번호 > 고정 파트너번호 > 관리파트너 번호 > 미지정(9000001) */ , NVL(NVL(S2.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO, NVL(S1.FXN_PRTNR_NO, S1.MNGT_PRTNR_NO)), '9000001') AS MNGT_PRTNR_NO , NVL(S2.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD, NVL(S1.FXN_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD, S1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD)) AS MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD , NVL(NVL(S2.CNFM_PSIC_DV_CD, NVL(S1.FXN_PRTNR_DV_CD, S1.MNGR_DV_CD)), '1') AS MNGR_DV_CD , S1.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD , S1.SV_HSHD_NO , S1.SV_PD_CD , S1.FXN_PRTNR_YN FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ S1 /*월별고객서비스대상내역 202TB*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ S2 /*고객서비스BS배정내역 261TB*/ ON S1.CNTR_NO = S2.CNTR_NO AND S1.CNTR_SN = S2.CNTR_SN AND S1.MNGT_YM = S2.ASN_OJ_YM AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN SVPD_INF P1 /*매니저 방문이 있는 서비스*/ ON S1.SV_PD_CD = P1.SV_PD_CD WHERE 1=1 AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND S1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} GROUP BY S1.MNGT_YM, NVL(NVL(CNFM_PSIC_DV_CD, NVL(S1.FXN_PRTNR_DV_CD, S1.MNGR_DV_CD)), '1'), NVL(CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD, NVL(S1.FXN_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD, S1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD)), NVL(NVL(S2.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO, NVL(S1.FXN_PRTNR_NO, MNGT_PRTNR_NO)), '9000001'), S1.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD, S1.SV_HSHD_NO, S1.SV_PD_CD, S1.FXN_PRTNR_YN ) , OG_INF_PRTNR AS ( /* 조직정보 파트너 */ SELECT T1.OG_TP_CD , T1.PRTNR_NO , T1.PRTNR_KNM , T1.BASE_YM , RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY T1.PRTNR_NO ORDER BY T1.OG_TP_CD DESC) AS RNK FROM WSMDBS.TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 /*월파트너내역*/ INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T2 /*파트너기본*/ ON T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 /*월조직내역*/ ON T1.OG_ID = T3.OG_ID AND T1.BASE_YM = T3.BASE_YM AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T4 /*월조직내역*/ ON T3.BASE_YM = T4.BASE_YM AND T3.HGR_OG_ID = T4.OG_ID AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY T1.PRTNR_KNM ) , PD_INF AS ( /* 상품정보 */ SELECT T1.PD_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL02 /* 방문주기 */ FROM WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 /*상품기본*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD IN ('SCHD') ) /* 결과 조회 */ SELECT SUBSTR(T1.MNGT_YM,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(T1.MNGT_YM,5,2) AS MNGT_YM /* AC202_MGT_YM */ , (CASE WHEN T1.FXN_PRTNR_YN = 'Y' THEN '고정' WHEN T1.MNGR_DV_CD = '1' THEN '매니저' WHEN T1.MNGR_DV_CD = '2' THEN '엔지니어' ELSE '' END ) AS MNGR_DV_NM , T1.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD /* AC202_BAD_AR */ , T1.SV_HSHD_NO /* AC202_CUST_ID */ , T2.PRTNR_NO /* AC202_EMP_ID */ , T2.PRTNR_KNM /* AC202_EMP_ID */ , T2.OG_TP_CD /* AC202_DEPT_CD */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELL', 'SV_VST_PRD_CD', T3.PD_PRP_VAL02) AS VST_PRD_NM /* AC202_CYCL_TYP */ FROM MNGT_CSTN_INF T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN OG_INF_PRTNR T2 ON T1.MNGT_YM = T2.BASE_YM AND T1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD AND T1.MNGT_PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND T2.RNK = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN PD_INF T3 ON T1.SV_PD_CD = T3.PD_CD ORDER BY T1.MNGT_YM DESC
